name: bpxl-redux-handbook
description: An opionated way to write applications with Redux

scripts.build: npm run prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Book update' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Book update' && git push git@github.com:brandonjpierce/redux-handbook gh-pages --force
